name: @symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store-workspace
description: Workspace for DynamoDB Entity Store packages

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store && npm run build --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store-testutils
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store-testutils && npm run unit-tests --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store && npm run integration-tests --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store
scripts.local-checks: npm run local-checks --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store-testutils && npm run local-checks --workspace=@symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store
